text: @SenSchumer Dear Senator, I am not White but I knew many whites too striving hard for Rent due to Covid-19 lockdown and jobless! So please do not see with one Eye like @POTUS  seems to me "One eyed rule in the kingdom of blind peoples!" Thanks ... AuthorWGA-Amazon
